title: Regarding my issue in solo queue. (update)
body:
For the past 3000+ games I have had 90%+ of my teammates seriously outmatched in every way in comparison to the enemy team.

I know how much of a team game this is and how much of an impact teammates can make in a game both to help you and detriment you.

If I could please have someone add me or reply to this post regarding my issue, this would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks.

http://imgur.com/ZucM1Ve

This needs to stop

These games are 100% unwinnable.

I can't play solo queue and expect my ability to show through like this.

Either people need to be told and made aware that solo queue is not a representation of ones ability, but is simply a randomly matched game where the outcome is not even moderately determined by a single player, but the collaboration of all of the players in the game as a whole which does not give an accurate representation of ones ability as a player.

replies.body:
he needs to show the game before that one, where he was 8-13 or so, vs 16-9 sion, and he called it him carrying, he did pretty bad and so did his duo. they had a vayne who was really good mechanically, but the 2 of them abused the living hell out of her because she couldnt dodge taric stuns. lol.

him and his duo, yi, fed the hell out of voli and vayne early in that game, 3-3 and 0-5 when the only other deaths in the team at that point was morde who had to vs vayne and rene top. by the time they came down bot lane it was too late for cait and ali started roaming.

they trolled in champ select because FP cait ADC and he wanted ADC. so he went twitch mid....

end of it all, dont listen to this troll. he is bad and belongs in bronze. and always has.

You mean where I started my lane 2-0 against sion AND malphite?

Dude if your not going to tell the truth don't talk crap about it.

here is the match details

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/78318550/200197387?tab=overview
"im bad and do bad, but one time i got 2 kills and then lost from there. i cant win a team game even with a duo"
Holy %%%% that build is cringe worthy. How did you even make it to bronze 2?
If ur vs VOLI u really need boots, and BORK.
By carrying 1v5 against a fed enemy team, how did you make it out of bronze?

> [{quoted}](name=whitePumah,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KjInogFE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-02-08T01:41:00.164+0000)
>
> By carrying 1v5 against a fed enemy team, how did you make it out of bronze?

I'm not that delusional. Maybe if you didn't build like a moron, and if you farmed better, you wouldn't lose so often.
That's a lie, you being Bronze is your fault and yours alone, stop blaming other people.
what ability? you don't even have boots. jesus christ you deserve to be bronze.

"3000+"
Shows 72 and 73 games.
"90%+ of my teammates"; "These games are 100% unwinnable."
73 wins.
72 losses.
you know what he meant stop being ignorant.

I know what he meant, but its way over-exaggerated. Like, what is the point of talking about an issue if the facts are so exaggerated that they no longer have much to do with the issue? I think we can be more constructive if we use more realistic numbers.

90%+ of my teammates are outmatched in every way compared to the enemy

This is the start of a new season and also this is my 2nd account.

I have had 3000+ games in total over 3 years.

Regarding the image I linked, games like that are unwinnable.

Does this clear things up for you?

3000+ games over 3 years.


Sorry but with this information alone there's nothing more to say other than you are not good at League and you being Bronze is your fault no one elses.

> [{quoted}](name=whitePumah,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KjInogFE,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-08T00:42:45.497+0000)
>
> 90%+ of my teammates are outmatched in every way compared to the enemy
> 
> This is the start of a new season and also this is my 2nd account.
> 
> I have had 3000+ games in total over 3 years.
> 
> Regarding the image I linked, games like that are unwinnable.
> 
> Does this clear things up for you?

Games like that are pretty unwinnable, yes. But you are saying 90%+ of your teammates are outmatched in everyway which, statistically, makes no sense at all. In a sample size of over 3000 games, that is borderline impossible. And if all of this is true, then how is it that you have a win rate higher than 50% for ranked games this season?
Find someone you know who is competent to climb with and you'll have an easier time, but there are gonna be games where both of you are outclassed too.

Exactly my point, I calculated that without any win streak mmr bonus or other factors streak based factors, the amount of which I would have climbed given the rate of teammates at 20% unwinnable games I could have gone from bronze to diamond 6 times over with the points I would have won.

This is specifically why I have been posting this and trying to enquire about it to Riot for some time now as to why this is happening. I am looking for information such as behavioural factors or leaving games which could have some sort of side effect to mmr in determining which players get put on which side when players are matched.

If you don't trust team mates, don't play team-reliant roles or team-reliant champions within those roles.

The nature of Solo Q is make an impact as big as you can, as soon as you can and then just keep doing it.

Malphite and Vi are great examples. With basic game knowledge you can gank another lane at level 6 and nearly always secure a kill.

If you're set on playing AD Carry, though, get onto champions like Ashe or Sivir or something else with high kill potential at level 6+. Either duo with a jungler or support main and hard farm until 10-15 minutes in then call the jungler bot kill the enemy bot lane and the turret then go dragon then back then siege mid.

This will set your whole team up very well coming into mid game and give them incentive to stick together as a team and try to snowball their advantage.

I used this exact strategy back in Season 3 to get from Bronze III to Silver III using only Annie and Quinn.

This game is a team game, I have tried every champion I own every possible way of carrying, the common factor stopping my progress is my teammates do not realise how badly they are hindering my ability to carry. I have no problem destroying the enemy team in a balanced match.

Duo bot is the absolute most effective way of carrying a game I have found thus far. Yet no matter how many times I ping back the enemy jungler to stop taking my farm after they thought they would surprise the enemy by running in from our turret in clear sight of the minion waves, they still push our wave into the enemy so they can free farm while we are about to get ganked by 4+ enemies who didn't get MIA called on them when they are 5-0 at 10 mins. The enemy team then proceeds to follow me around the map while my team is unsure of whether they should push lanes as the jungler, or clear jungle as the laner.

90% of games is not right, I should not have to be worth 4 of my teammates as well in order to win a TEAM game.

http://www.nerfplz.com/2014/12/2014-champion-tier-list-solo-queue.html

Use that as a guideline then. Just pick a champion that you're good at, that suits the team comp, that's as close to God Tier as possible.
It is not who I am playing that is the problem, it is my team in which I am matched with who makes it impossible to carry them.

I've won games in high gold-low plat where players have actually started trolling and feeding.

You should have no issue where you are unless you're where you're meant to be.
where do you think you deserve to be? cause if you deserve to climb, you will.
Ur only mistake was not buying boots kek

picking mid twitch and yi jungle leaving no magic damage apart from morde and no tank apart from alistar who fed like cray cray.
yi being terrible and never ganking/leaving others to die when they save him.
both feeding early game.
raging since champ select. 
abusing everyone.
no BORK. rush PD.

more than 1 mistake.

Leaving others to die when they SAVE him, so he is meant to go right back in there is he? Is that your definition of not being terrible?

Feeding early game............................

Yes I did nothing but abuse my teammates, that is how I got the only positive score on my team right?

If you have ever played mordekaiser properly before you might realise that he can solo a whole team with magic damage. If mordekaiser didn't feed and allow 3 enemies to stroll through his jungle uncontested he would of got his devourers, alistar is magic damage, oh wait look we have 3 champions who would be dealing decent magic damage.

I know more about this game than you will ever know.
so many fukwits on these forums  and how the fuq voli got 29 kills

he was actually pretty good. we had no tank apart from alistar who tried to 1 vs 1 him instead of peel him off people. yi was intentionally feeding and voli/rene were so tanky they could live under towers for 20 seconds each, but also had enough damage they could take anyone out in less than that with no problems, because no one was tanky enough.
a couple times i Eed the wrong way and got abused repeatedly by OP and his duo the yi. but at that point it was too late, Eing the wrong way 2-3 times didnt change the fact yi and twitch fed 6 kills between them in the first 10 mins. but also morde was feeding kills. basically 12 mins of free farming before i got 4 man ganked bot lane.

and he can say all he wants, but he lost both mid towers without taking any off the ahri. so even if he was 3-3 and she was 1-3, he was behind in CS and towers, it wasnt until i went mid for a 5 man group that never happened (everyone kept spamming to group but any time i went near twitch, he went to a different lane and started abusing me saying that i went ADC when he called it and i wasnt even going bot along with other obscenities)

Did I mention that in the previous game where I won my lane he stated that he had carried my team member to gold, he screwed up his E as cait 2-3 times. I have probably screwed up my E the same amount of times, over 100+ games with cait.

I do not want to have to bring these things up and sound immature but if he is willing to lie to try cover himself up in a image where he clearly could not do his job, then I feel like I must defend myself.

1: 2-0 in the first 6 mins of the game, taking a stolen red off sion and a blue off malph. then by 20 mins....2-6. LOL didnt lose lane cos 2-0 in 6 mins...RIGHT. 6 mins is all of laning phase amirite.
2: duo'ed with a 1200 game silver 4, less than 100 games together and he was gold....
3: could not do my job? 4-4-25 support taric who was the only reason vayne didnt rampage? the only thing that stopped her getting pentas was my targetted stun, if she got QSS she could have got penta easily because she was actually REALLY good.
or talking about the cait game? its hard to do anything vs a fed as %%%% voli on a team with 0 peel. voli and rene just dived under inhib towers (the only place i messed up my E because they were standing RIGHT on top of me and i misclicked)
i had 1 bad game, whereas you get slaughtered literally every game because you are legit TERRIBLE at this game and cant admit it.
you say you got to silver 1 in preseason....when you WERE on my friends list, you were still bronze 3 in preseason...and barely 50% win rate....no idea how you could have gotten to silver 1 in less than a month without being boosted...and even then, boosting in preseason is 100% pointless lol.

The one game your put onto my team you do bad all of a sudden out of 4 straight wins?

You say you had no peel when your caitlyn and I am twitch?

I have never been boosted, in fact I have received 2 skins from duoing and getting people into the next league.

I get slaughtered?

You got free farm and I still did way better than you vs someone who counters me along with constant back and forth jungle invading defense and being ganked by the fed enemies that the 17 death mordekaiser fed, yet you blame me, along with every other teammate I end up with in game.

I have never ever stated that I got silver 1 over preseason, the fact that you can't even interpret text correctly is just sad.

Hey look, the match details!

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/78329885/200197387?tab=overview
yes, but that doesn't change the fact that you don't even have botrk or boots.
